statements: SELECT * FROM SavingsPlan WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, savings_amount FROM SavingsPlan WHERE savings_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, savings_amount, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlan WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT customer_id, savings_amount FROM SavingsPlan ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlan WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlan WHERE savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_id, savings_amount FROM SavingsPlan WHERE interest_rate > 0.05;
SELECT customer_id, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlan WHERE savings_amount < 5000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlan WHERE savings_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT AVG(savings_amount) as average_savings FROM SavingsPlan;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, savings_balance FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, investment_amount, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlans WHERE interest_rate > 2.5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, savings_balance FROM Customers WHERE savings_balance > 5000 ORDER BY savings_balance DESC;
SELECT plan_id, customer_id, plan_name, investment_amount FROM SavingsPlans WHERE investment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY plan_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, savings_balance FROM Customers WHERE savings_balance > 5000;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, s.plan_name, s.investment_amount FROM Customers c JOIN SavingsPlans s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, savings_balance FROM Customers ORDER BY savings_balance DESC;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.customer_name, s.plan_name, s.investment_amount FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN SavingsPlans s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM Customer ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT plan_name, amount_invested FROM SavingsPlan WHERE interest_rate > 5.0;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, amount_invested FROM Customer JOIN SavingsPlan ON Customer.customer_id = SavingsPlan.customer_id;
SELECT savingsplan_id, interest_earned FROM InterestRate WHERE calculation_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, date_of_birth FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT plan_name, amount_invested, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlan WHERE amount_invested > 5000;

SELECT customer_name, plan_name, interest_earned FROM Customer JOIN SavingsPlan ON Customer.customer_id = SavingsPlan.customer_id JOIN InterestRate ON SavingsPlan.savingsplan_id = InterestRate.savingsplan_id;

SELECT customer_name, plan_name, interest_earned FROM Customer INNER JOIN SavingsPlan ON Customer.customer_id = SavingsPlan.customer_id INNER JOIN InterestRate ON SavingsPlan.savingsplan_id = InterestRate.savingsplan_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customer WHERE age > 25;
SELECT email FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT id, name, age, gender, email FROM Customer ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT plan_id, customer_id, amount, start_date, end_date FROM SavingsPlan WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM SavingsPlan WHERE amount > 10000 AND start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT plan_id, amount, start_date FROM SavingsPlan ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT c.name, s.amount, i.interest_rate FROM Customer c JOIN SavingsPlan s ON c.id = s.customer_id JOIN Investment i ON s.plan_id = i.plan_id
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT plan_name, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlan;
SELECT * FROM Investments ORDER BY investment_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, amount FROM Customers JOIN CustomerInvestments ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerInvestments.customer_id JOIN Investments ON CustomerInvestments.investment_id = Investments.investment_id;
SELECT customer_name, savings_plan_id FROM Customers;
SELECT plan_name, interest_rate FROM SavingsPlan WHERE interest_rate > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, plan_name, amount FROM Customers JOIN SavingsPlan ON Customers.savings_plan_id = SavingsPlan.savings_plan_id;

SELECT customer_name, investment_date FROM Customers JOIN CustomerInvestments ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerInvestments.customer_id JOIN Investments ON CustomerInvestments.investment_id = Investments.investment_id;
SELECT rate, start_date, end_date FROM InterestRates WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
